page.title: 05Clubs
page.content: At last they found a patch of land.It was going to be a fire station but when they built one in Telford the idea was scrapped.The scouts and guides asked if they could use the land and the county council agreed. But they needed Â£26,000 in order to build the hut.They began all sorts of fund raising such as coffee morning bazaars(one Christmas bazaar raised Â£900!).They had a sponsored cycle ride down the newly built M54 before it was opened.A cub leader Mrs.Lowe made lots of furry animals and Christmas cards to be sold at fetes and bazaars.They were given Â£6,000 by the council and other small charities.In April 1982 they started building the hut.The building was used for the guides 75th birthday party.The building should be ready by 1986.
